metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1836 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Moodle 2.x through 2.1.10, 2.2.x before 2.2.8, 2.3.x before 2.3.5, and2.4.x before 2.4.2 does not properly manage privileges for WebDAVrepositories, which allows remote authenticated users to read, modify, ordelete arbitrary site-wide repositories by leveraging certain read access.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
